main.name: Paul Wang
main.description: Hi! I'm a software developer recently graduated from the University of Calgary. I was interested in full-stack development and so I built this website to explore it.
main.bio: Once a programmer, I'm currently looking to utilize my technical background to transition into a Product Owner role, feel free to reach out via the contact information below!

work.title: Technical Analyst
work.description: Currently working as a software developer for Teck Coal, developing and providing support for an array of Drilling and Blasting applications using C# .NET Core and C++

work.title: Student Software Developer
work.description: One year co-op - worked as a junior developer on application level C++ software for embedded GPS/communication devices. Experienced CI/CD Jenkins pipelines via automated GoogleTest/Python tests.

work.title: Interactive Web Developer
work.description: Worked with teachers, gathering requirements to develop learning tools/javascript web-apps to aid their respective online Moodle courses.
